昨日も同じこと言ってた。: She said the same thing yesterday.
める、なんかずっとグルグル回ってなかった？\nあれあんなにする意味ある？: Meguru, didn't you go around in circles the whole time? <b>Wait, what's the point of doing that?
反復練習は大切だからな。とりあえず採掘量の計測だが……: It's important to practice over and over again. For now, let's measure the amount of mines...
おめでとう。まずは全員合わせての話だ。: Congratulations. First, let's talk about everyone together.
一度の潜航における採掘量としては、今までのシリウスシュガーの最大採掘量の数倍を記: For a single dive, we've recorded several times the maximum amount of mines in Sirius Sugar so far.
す、数倍！？\nそんなにいっぱい掘れちゃったんですか！？: S-Several times?! Did you dig that much?!
今回はメイズシフターに的を絞ったとはいえ、ものすごい戦果だわ……: We may have narrowed our focus to the maise shifter this time, but it's still an incredible achievement...
うへ～、がっぽがっぽじゃん！\nちなみに１位は誰！？ ラミ！？: Wow, it's so empty! Who's first place, by the way? Rami?!
実は今回、個々の量はそんなに変わりはないんだ。\n僅差でちょっとちゆるが多い程度: Actually, there's not much difference in the amount of each person this time. It's just a slight difference in brute force.
……そこでだ。\n個人的には、今日は七彩を評価したいと思ってる。:
......that's where it happened. Personally,
I want to evaluate Shichika today.
ああ。お前の立ち回り方がとてもよかった。\nみんなのそれぞれの動きを把握し、全体: Yes. Your movements were very good. You were able to grasp everyone's movements and see the whole thing, weren't you?
例えば撃ち漏らしの撃滅だったり、先手を取って敵の進入路を押さえたり、な。: For example, shoot them down, or take the first move to pin down the enemy's entry route.
……ええ、確かに、そのように動いていましたわ。: ...Yes, that's exactly what he was doing.
これまでと違う点について、自覚している部分はあるか？: Is there anything you're aware of that's different from before?
ええと……今までとにかく前に立って、\nわたくしが戦局を切り開く状況が多かったよ: Let's see... Up until now, I've been standing in front of you, and I think there's been a lot of situations where I can lead the war.
今回はそれを控えて、\n代わりにまずは全体を見ようと心がけました。:
This time, I refrained from doing that, and instead of a
, I decided to look at the whole thing first.
そうだ。七彩はとても広い視野で物事を見ることに長けている。\nひとつのことに集中: That's right. Shichika excels at seeing things in a very wide field of view. Contrary to his knack for focusing on just one thing, he has a unique personality.
七彩はチームワークにこだわりがあった。\n自分が仲間を引っ張っていくリーダーであ: Shichika was particular about teamwork. He was trying to be the leader of the group.
だが、それだと本来の力が発揮できない。\n広い視野を活かした支援、それが適材適所:
But that means I can't use my true power.
Support that makes use of my wide field of view, and that makes me the right person.
じゃあ、あたしたちが大きな被弾もなく撃破数を稼げたのは……: So the only reason we were able to get the numbers we needed without getting hit was...
……わたくしに合った、戦い方……\nあなたには、それがわかっていたのですか？:
......a way of fighting that suits me......
Did you know that?
……さあ、どうだかな。\n途中で気づいたような気もするし、最初からだった気もする:
...I don't know. I feel like I noticed it in the middle of the
part, and it was from the beginning.
そして今回が今までと決定的に違ったのは、\n全員が『自分で勝ちに行く』意識を持て:
And what was decisively different this time was that all the
members had the mindset to “go win on their own.”
チームワークとは、『味方に勝ってもらう』ことじゃない。\n『自分の力でチームを勝:
Teamwork doesn't mean “getting your allies to win.”
“Getting your team to win with your own strength.”
俺の言葉に、５人の表情が引き締まる。: The five of them tightened their expressions at my words.
演習でボロ負けした原因もそれだ。\n技術や陣形以前に、心が勝利に向いていなかった:
That was also the reason I’d lost so badly in the exercise. My heart hadn’t been cut out for victory before my
skills and formation.
だから、指揮もなく味方も頼れない状況でも、個人の力で戦う意識をさせたんだ。: That's why I made them feel like fighting under their own power, even in situations where they couldn't rely on their allies without command.
やっぱり……%usernameusernameuserna%さんは、\nちゃんと: I knew it... %username, username, userna%-san really did look at us, didn't she?
信じてよかったです。あなたのことを……！: I'm glad I believed you. You...!
あの厳しい訓練も全部、\nわたくしたちを叩きなおすための荒療治だったんですのね。: That rigorous training was all a drastic measure to retaliate against us, huh?
そーゆーことだったのかー！\n最初はイジメかと思ったわ！: So that's how it is! At first, I thought you were bullying me!
……でも、確かに感じた。ＭＧと一体になって、勝利を目指す感覚。: ...But I definitely felt it. The feeling of becoming one with MG and aiming for victory.
そうだね。さすがは生徒会長の選んだ指揮官ってとこかな。\n厳しいけど、こうも結果: That's right. I guess that's to be expected from the commander chosen by the student council president. <b>It's tough, but I can't let you see the results like this.
いや、お前たちの方こそ、期待以上の成長だよ。\nこの調子なら、どんどん強くなれる: No, you guys have grown more than I expected. <b>At this rate, you should be able to get stronger and stronger.
そして心に刻んでおくんだ！\nどんな時でも、自分の力で勝ちに行くってことを！: And carve it into your heart! No matter the time or place, you'll always go to win with your own strength!
ここからが本当のシリウスシュガーの戦いだ！\n全員で、カオスメイデンに勝つぞ！:
This is where the real battle of Sirius Sugar begins! Let's beat Chaos Maiden with all the
members!
